law.text: Any person who is not a licensed or certified real property appraiser who engages in an activity described in KRS 324A.030, shall be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor. Each violation should be regarded as a separate offense.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 16, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 247, sec. 9, effective April 7, 1992. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 15, effective July 13, 1990.
